SELECT CONCAT('code', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(uIn.usedin_code,5) AS DECIMAL)+1)) AS usedinCode ,d.device_code as deviceCode
FROM tb_usedin as uIn ,(SELECT device_code FROM tb_device where device_model=#{deviceModel} and device_type=#{deviceType} and device_color=#{deviceColor}) as d
INSERT into tb_usedin ( usedin_code ,usedin_serial ,usedin_telecom ,device_code ,usedin_status ,usedin_date ,usedin_price ,staff_code ,usedin_memo ,usedin_reg_date ) values ( #{usedinCode} ,#{usedinSerial} ,#{usedinTelecom} ,#{deviceCode} ,'신규' ,now() ,#{usedinPrice} ,#{usedinStaff} ,#{usedinMemo} ,now() )
